required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 13, 2016
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Phase Iv Study On Muscle Activity Of Two Commercial Preparations Of Botulinum
clinical_study.official_title: PHASE IV STUDY ON MUSCLE ACTIVITY OF TWO COMMERCIAL PREPARATIONS OF BOTULINUM TOXIN TYPE A ADMINISTERED TO THE UPPER THIRD OF THE FACE.

lead_sponsor.agency: Brazilan Center for Studies in Dermatology

clinical_study.source: Brazilan Center for Studies in Dermatology

oversight_info.authority: Brazil: National Committee of Ethics in Research

brief_summary.textblock: this study was proposed to provide more scientific and objective data on the clinical and aesthetic effects of these two toxins (Dysport and Xeomin).

detailed_description.textblock:
Subjects will perform 6 (six) visits during the study:
Screening visit, performed 30 to 1 day before the visit 1, when eligible subjects will be recruited and first evaluations will be performed; visit 1, which is the baseline and when the injections will be performed; visit 2, 30 +/- 3 days after the injections, when evaluations will be performed; visit 3, 90 +/- 3 days after the injections, when evaluations will be performed; 4, 120 +/- 3 days after the injections, when evaluations will be performed; visit 5, 150 +/- 3 days after the injections, when evaluations will be performed.
Assessment of percentage (%) of responders, after 5 months of injection, to the effects of two BT-A preparations, Dysport® and Xeomin®, by measuring frontalis m. wrinkle intensity at maximum contraction, as measured by visual Wrinkles Severity Scale (WSS).

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Double Blind (Subject, Investigator), Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Responders After 5 Months After the Procedure
primary_outcome.description: Percentage (%) of responders, after 5 months of injection, to the effects of two botulinum toxin type A (BT-A), Dysport® and Xeomin®. Responders were defined as individuals who presented at least 1 score less in the Wrinkles Scale Score at maximum contraction compared to the WSS score at baseline.

secondary_outcome.measure: Maximum Evoked Compound Muscle Action Potential
secondary_outcome.description: To evaluate the duration, magnitude and peak of effects of two BT-A preparations, by measuring of the maximum Evoked Compound Muscle Action Potentials after contraction.

arm_group.description: Xeomin® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Dysport® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

intervention.description: Dysport® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Xeomin® was injected on the left side of the forehead.
Xeomin® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Dysport® was injected on the left side of the forehead

facility.name: Brazilian Center For Studies in Dermatology

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Brazilan Center for Studies in Dermatology

participant_flow.recruitment_details: All patients included in this study were recruted from two research centers.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: We did not have any drop-out in this study.

group.title: Dysport and Xeomin
group.description: Dysport® was injected on the one side of the forehead and Xeomin® was injected on the other side of the forehead.

group.title: Xeomin and Dysport
group.description: Xeomin® was injected on the one side of the forehead and Dysport® was injected on the other side of the forehead.

outcome.title: Percentage of Responders After 5 Months After the Procedure
outcome.description: Percentage (%) of responders, after 5 months of injection, to the effects of two botulinum toxin type A (BT-A), Dysport® and Xeomin®. Responders were defined as individuals who presented at least 1 score less in the Wrinkles Scale Score at maximum contraction compared to the WSS score at baseline.
outcome.population: 80 sujbects were included in this study, each patient have received both products in their faces. The randomization was performed to define the side for each product.

group.title: Dysport
group.description: Dysport® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Xeomin® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

group.title: Xeomin
group.description: Xeomin® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Dysport® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

measure.title: Percentage of Responders After 5 Months After the Procedure
measure.description: Percentage (%) of responders, after 5 months of injection, to the effects of two botulinum toxin type A (BT-A), Dysport® and Xeomin®. Responders were defined as individuals who presented at least 1 score less in the Wrinkles Scale Score at maximum contraction compared to the WSS score at baseline.

outcome.title: Maximum Evoked Compound Muscle Action Potential
outcome.description: To evaluate the duration, magnitude and peak of effects of two BT-A preparations, by measuring of the maximum Evoked Compound Muscle Action Potentials after contraction.
outcome.population: All subjects have received both treatments.

group.title: Dysport
group.description: Dysport® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Xeomin® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

group.description: Xeomin® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Dysport® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

measure.description: To evaluate the duration, magnitude and peak of effects of two BT-A preparations, by measuring of the maximum Evoked Compound Muscle Action Potentials after contraction.

group.title: Dysport
group.description: Dysport® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Xeomin® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

group.title: Xeomin
group.description: Xeomin® was injected on the right side of the forehead and Dysport® was injected on the left side of the forehead.

event.description: Worsening of Glabellar frown lines, transitory and related to the study medication.
Injection site bleeding, not related to the study medication. It was associated to the injection.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
